start_sources()
sources_platform(WINDOWS)
add_sources("NoUberFile"

)

	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"CrySpatial.def"

		"stdafx.h"
)

sources_platform(DURANGO)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Header Files"
		"resource.h"

	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"

	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"stdafx.cpp"

)

sources_platform(ORBIS)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Header Files"
		"resource.h"

	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"
		"CrySpatialFXShared.cpp"
)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"stdafx.cpp"
		"stdafx.h"

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

#Defines
add_definitions(-DUNICODE -D_UNICODE -D_USRDLL -D_AFXDLL -DWWISE_AUTHORING -DAUDIOKINETIC -DAKSOUNDENGINE_DLL)

if (AUDIO_WWISE AND NOT OPTION_STATIC_LINKING)
CryEngineModule(CrySpatialWwise PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio/Implementations/Wwise/Plugins/CrySpatial")
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE CrySpatialWwiseFX)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${SDK_DIR}/Audio/wwise/SDK/include" )
target_compile_options( ${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /EHsc )

endif()
